title: Sonoma
name: Depot Hotel
directions: just about two blocks north of the Square
content: Housed in a former hotel dating back to the late 1800's, the Depot Hotel serves quality Italian food that has been family owned for decades. Don't let the rather uneventful interior fool you - make a reservation and sit out back where the hotel's historic pool provides a lovely atmosphere amongst the garden. Call ahead, it's a popular wedding spot.
